name: PKPaymentButtonStyle
desc: A type that indicates the available appearances for an Apple Pay button.

items.name: case white
items.desc: A white button with black lettering.

items.name: case whiteOutline
items.desc: A white button with black lettering and a black outline.

items.name: case black
items.desc: A black button with white lettering.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: A button that automatically changes its appearance when the user switches between Light Mode and Dark Mode.
